scenes.action_text: DEFIANCE Written by Clayton Frohman & Edward Zwick FADE IN: 1 NEW YORK CITY - PARK AVENUE - NIGHT - 1982 1 A TAXI pulls over to a curb where an ELDERLY MAN waits with his MIDDLE-AGED SON in THE RAIN. MIDDLE-AGED SON (as they climb in) 23rd and Lex. The CABBIE grunts a reply. MIDDLE-AGED SON (CONT'
